segments.text: Seeing this kitchen fills me with a sense of worry.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman dries her plate, lost in the motion.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But the overflowing sink is a disaster waiting.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water everywhere, damaging everything it touches.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot in the puddleâ€” she could fall so easily.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children behind her, unnoticed in their antics.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy teeters on that stool toward the cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: One wrong move, and he'll tumble down.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl reaches up, unaware of the danger too.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's sad how something joyful like cookies turns risky.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The calm garden view contrasts this impending trouble.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope she turns around before it's too late.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This scene tugs at my heart with its vulnerabilities.
segments.speaker: PAR
